phrases: The Unmovable Sovereign, Ozen the Immovable.
This irredeemable lesson of hers is a trial before setting off anew...
It is survival training to help these children stay alive as they make their way through the world of the Abyss.
Spend ten days here with the equipment you have got.
Show me you are able to survive.
Be sure not to go beyond that Pillar Tree.
I will consider that as trying to escape.
Well then, I am heading back now.
Huh?!
Do your best to protect this girl so that she does not return to being a corpse.
In addition, you cannot use that thing for these ten days.
My Incinerator?
Go ahead and use it if you want to get Riko killed.
What do you mean?
Once you fire it, no matter how you push yourself, you always faint after around ten minutes.
Then it is a full two hours until you wake up.
Just try leaving a helpless child on her own in the second layer for two hours.
I wonder just how she will be torn to shreds and eaten...
Still, when you really do have to use it,
go all out to make sure whatever it is does not come after you again in the future.
No matter your opponent or whatever lies in the vicinity,
when the time comes, do not hesitate or show any mercy.
Otherwise, your adventure will be over in the blink of an eye.
Daremo ga sakaraezu ni mogutteiku
Sono me o tomoshibi yori kagayakasete
Mezasu saki wa fukaku
Massugu ni mayoikomu
Kuchiaketa naraku no wana
Shinjitsu no ato o oikakeyou
I Am About To kotae ga mitsukaru nara zenbu nakushitemo ii
Sono koe o hanasanai youni kodama ga mada hibiiteru
Rashinban wa zutto
Yami o sashita mama
Nigeba no nai
Hou e
Sore ga noroi demo
Kodou wa honmono
Nidoto akogare wa tomaranai
First of all, we need to look for some water...
Ah, what is that?
It is glowing!
A-ah, Riko, be careful!
Wow!
How beautiful!
This is great.
We found some water!
Think it is okay to drink?
It is fine!
Those are rohanas, a kind of insect that only lives in clean water.
Hm?
Damn...
In what way is that thing docile?
We did it!
Around here, the animals have regressed eyes, so they should be susceptible to light.
If we build a fire, I think they will keep their distance.
Susceptible to light, huh?
Let us go look for some insect-repelling plants...
How is it looking?
Riko is certainly plucky,
but her body cannot keep up with what she wants to do...
And that boy Reg...
Riko, where are you?
Although his body is extraordinarily resilient, he is constantly losing his nerves...
Although his body is extraordinarily resilient, he is constantly losing his nerves...
and is slow to make decisions.
Stop it!
and is slow to make decisions.
This despite the fact he is a mechanical doll...
I see...
You are not going out there?
If they die now, it just means they did not have what it takes to go any further.
Reg, you are strong, but your body is light...
So we will have to devise a plan if we are going to catch that hippo thing...
In that case, maybe I could extend my arm to bind it to a tree or something...
Uh-huh, uh-huh...
Well, then let us lead it there!
How?
Ta-da!
We will use this!
What the heck is it?
It stinks...
It is dung from a female and some tree bark.
I tore off a piece that is covered in pheromones.
Use this to lure it.
And when it gets close to you, Reg, we will blind it with our glow-stones!
How is that sound?!
H-hmm...
You think it will work?
It will be fine!
Let us just try our best!
Do it now!
Reg!
Be it an immature body or weak psyche,
they will not be showing real changes in those areas any time soon...
But, just as you predicted, they are making enormous progress in the things they are good at.
Well, there are two of them, after all...
So it is best that they learn to depend on one another.
Depend on one another, huh?
Ozen!
Ozen!
Who attacked you?!
Just you wait!
I will annihilate those punks!
What is the matter, Ozen?
You giving up already?
This is amazing, Ozen!
A whole field of Flowers of Fortitude!
It does not even feel like we are in the middle of the netherworld!
This is Torka from my squad.
I got married to him!
Sorry, Ozen...
Do you mind giving me a bit of time alone?
How incredibly maddening.
To think that no sooner than Torka quickly passed away...
even the baby was stillborn...
That is some nerve to leave the delivery to me...
That dumb face and you come along, and just when Lyza had finally mellowed out, she gets treated like this?
How maddening...
I did not want to see Lyza in such a state.
I do not have much strength left.
Perhaps I will just leave this thing behind here and carry the Bell up with Lyza...
Good grief, I have taken on another burden now...
Just relax...
I have a strong sense of duty.
This is pretty good!
With this we should be able to make it through the remaining five days!
Yeah.
Are you alright, Riko?
Yeah...
Somehow... it feels like ages since we were here...
It is actually been 10 days.
Good work out there.
Both of you are quite amazing.
Personally, I started crying right away...
Any further out than the Seeker Camp and it is almost completely dark...
and Master left and went back home by herself somewhere along the way...
Marulk, you know, even I...
Near the end when I got separated from Riko, I was feeling so hopeless...
Really?!
Absolutely.
Reg, so that happens to even you, huh?
That makes me feel a bit better.
Are you hungry?
I will bring you something to eat!
So it is already been ten days, huh?
Now that I think about it, the pain I was feeling from Ozen's thrashing is gone now.
I wonder if the Riko Hodgepodge Stew did the trick...
Alright!
My rehabilitation is complete!
This pattern...
Was it always like that...?
What does it mean, anyway?
At any rate...
seems I never put on any muscle...
Reg!
Riko!
Master is saying that now that you are back, we should all have a meal.
Food!
So how was it?
Spending 10 days there, I mean.
It was pretty hectic, was not it?
That is right...
Looking back at it now, it feels like it was over in the blink of an eye.
Do not stay in the deep layers if you do not want to kill those who are waiting for you...
There is an old saying like that, you see.
What does it mean?
One's sense of time goes mad.
It is particularly striking in the depths of the fifth layer.
I had intended to stay down there a few weeks,
but when I returned to the surface, a few months had passed.
Such occurrences are common...
So that rumor...
is true, then!
It is no rumor.
I am telling you flat out.
Well, only those with strange tastes -
basically just us White Whistles - would try living in the deep layers.
That saying I mentioned that if you stay there for a really long time,
everyone who is waiting for you will probably die, is somewhat of an exaggeration.
Still, you probably think it has nothing to do with you since you are making a journey of no return...
But the problem is that we cannot even estimate the extent
to which this madness manifests in the sixth and seventh layers.
I have a feeling that perhaps not as much time as we all think has actually passed for Lyza.
Ten years on the surface...
But if we assume that only a few years have passed at the bottom of the netherworld,
do not you get the feeling there is a very good chance she is alive and well?
Ozen...
Ozen!
Well, even so, you should do your best not to stay in the fifth layer for long.
And why would that be?
So that you do not bump into any of the other White Whistles...
The depths' fifth layer, the Sea of Corpses, is as deep as humans can go and return alive.
I suppose some of them are there...
The Sovereign of Guidance, Wakuna the Chosen.
The Sovereign of Mystery, Srajo the Mysterious.
The Sovereign of Dawn, Bondrewd the Novel.
Those are the other three who are down in the Abyss now.
Among them...
Bondrewd in particular is an out-and-out scoundrel.
He is not kind like I am, so you better be careful...
Is that... a joke?
Reg, you okay?
Ah, that is right...
Speaking of Lyza, I also have something I am curious about...
The slip in the sealed letter that said:
At the netherworld's bottom, I will be waiting...
I wonder who wrote that...
Huh?
It is written overly large in crooked penmanship,
using old nether glyphs without any of the simplified forms.
On top of that, the paper it is on is not even paper.
It is an unknown Relic.
It looks all worn out, but it really surprised me...
That thing cannot be ripped even with my strength.
What in the world is waiting down at the netherworld's bottom together with Lyza?
Well then...
both of you, follow me.
Here.
What is that?
Blaze Reap... the everlasting pickax.
That is right...
It is a specialized weapon with which Lyza the Annihilator spilled much blood.
It was stuck in the ground like a grave marker in that cluster of Eternal Fortunes I spoke of.
Huh?!
My mother's...
Riko...
The everlasting gunpowder inside it is fine, but the outer casing is in bad shape.
It can only be used a few more times at best.
Well, it is a piece of junk that occasionally misfired even back then.
We are talking about Lyza here, so I bet she is already found a new weapon.
I will teach you how to use it.
It should be able to act as an alternative to that Incinerator of yours.
You really mean that?!
Thank you!
In addition...
What I am about to tell you must not be shared with anyone else.
With those words, Ozen spoke of...
the numerous secrets that had been transmitted from the last dives of many generations of White Whistles,
which are passed down by word of mouth among only themselves.
Perhaps, those were the very deepest voices of Abyss that people are capable of carrying to us.
We heard about the cryptic device for traversing the fifth layer's Sea...
About how a white whistle's timbre acts as a key to activate a certain class of Relics.
About the mysterious ring of the seventh layer that only a few White Whistles are said to have seen.
When Ozen said she hates deceiving children, she was telling the truth...
From start to finish, this monster sitting before us held nothing back.
So you are already heading out, huh?
It will be lonely around here.
Do not you think it is cold of Ozen not to come see you off?
No, it is alright.
Huh?
She is already given us so much, after all...
She is taught us many things...
It would not be right to ask any more of her.
What is this?
Despite all appearances, you are quite humble.
Hey, cut that out.
Marulk!
Well, you take care now.
I find it hard to say this, but...
If you come back and say, It is impossible, after all, it would be oh so nice...
Marulk...
I have seen off all kinds of people who leave on journeys they will not return from...
But... today is the saddest I have ever felt.
Reg and that girl...
As expected, they were quick to pick up on cave-raiding techniques.
Although, I did not want to let them go until more memories come back...
Well, nothing I can do about it.
Right, Lyza?
That baby crawled toward the Abyss the moment she was let out of the Vessel,
which is pretty darn creepy, right?
Thanks to you, she is monstrously energetic now.
My apprentice is already fed up with her.
Well, that is just splendid...
You have an apprentice?
His name's Jiruo.
You have met him before, right?
Ah, that rash and shameless kid who turned down my invitation...
I prefer the Sovereign of Annihilation.
The fact that she has not dropped dead or been killed means you are doing a good job keeping her hidden.
If it ever came to light that she is your daughter,
she would be kidnapped by ruffians while you are down in the Abyss.
And, if you are lucky, she would be held hostage, but if you are unlucky...
It is alright.
My apprentice is top grade.
However, be that as it may...
Riko is incredibly precious to me.
No matter the Relic or whatever else of mine I offer as payment, it is not enough.
Thanks to a whole heap of priceless things, that girl is alive right now.
If I continue to stay with her, I am liable to take Riko's right to set off on adventures away from her,
and I myself will likely become separated from the Abyss.
Before that happens, I am heading out...
So that my girl is free to choose whatever path...
I wonder what you are glossing over here...
Is not it true that you simply got an urge to see the bottom?
Hey, Ozen...
If Riko once again sets out to reach the bottom and in doing so comes to stand before you,
I would like you to tell her.
You mean about how she is a living corpse?
That is right.
About how much of a miracle it took to make it so that she is able to move at all...
About how to tackle the magnificent adventures that are waiting for her...
What a pain.
Do that yourself.
Well, if we are just talking about sending her on to you...
I will do it.
Good grief...
How irredeemable...
How very irredeemable...
The Inverted Forest...
It is so far above us...
Reg...
Are you ready?
Of course.
Sora ni ukanderu hikaru nami o
Tabanete niji no hashi o kakeyou
Ayaui ashiba, suberu slope
Kako to mirai no michishirube
Kimi no hidarite, boku no migite o
Tsunaide tsunagete hajimeyou
Itsumo soba ni iru yo
Kako mo i am about to mo mirai mo
Dakara mayowazu ni aruiteikou
Irotoridori no yume kasanete
Ashita wa doko ni mukau
Kimi to issho ni iretara, sekai wa kagayakidasu yo
Saihate no chi ni saku hana o sagasou
